Package com.facebook.buck.core.rules.actions

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    An Action that forms the Action graph.
    ActionExecutionResult
    Represents the result of executing the Action
    ActionExecutionResult.ActionExecutionFailure
    execution that failed
    ActionExecutionResult.ActionExecutionSuccess
    A successful action execution
    ActionRegistry
    The registry for Actions, which creates its corresponding ActionWrapperData.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAction
    Base implementation of an Action
    ActionExecutionContext
    Holds the information Actions can use for its Action.execute(ActionExecutionContext)
    ActionWrapperData
    Implementation of ActionAnalysisData that just holds an Action.
    DefaultActionRegistry
    The action registry that should be used throughout Buck to handle registering actions.
    ImmutableActionExecutionContext
    Immutable implementation of ActionExecutionContext.
    ImmutableActionExecutionFailure
    Immutable implementation of ActionExecutionResult.ActionExecutionFailure.
    ImmutableActionExecutionSuccess
    Immutable implementation of ActionExecutionResult.ActionExecutionSuccess.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ActionCreationException
    Represents an error during action creation
